tic_tac_toe.description: Two players alternatively select a cell of the board. The winner is the one who owns three cells in a row, column or diagonal.

poker.description: Players have to have the best hand, or at least pretend so in order to get other players' chips.

falken.description: The objective is unknown. Probably a sort of maze.

chess.description: Two players alternatively make a move. The objective it to take the opponent's kind piece.
